phrases: When you are with Tsutsugami Gai,
please press the blue button twice, and then the red one once.
We will come to mete out the appropriate punishment on them.
No matter where they may be.
I do not know if it is due to the shock of having his Void used,
but he shows no sign of waking.
In that case, I will formally reintroduce him.
We will be placing Shu at the core of our strategies henceforth.
Now that he is joined us and we have acquired Kido Kenji,
Depending on the situation on the ground, there are 145 diverging patterns it could take.
You will all memorize every last one of them by the time we begin the operation.
If you cannot even manage that, do not participate.
It has not even been a full day since our raid on the isolation facility.
What did you people come here for?
I doubt it was for a pleasant nap!
Do you plan to waltz into the enemy's line of fire while bleary-eyed from sleep?
for giving him enough basic training to keep up on this mission.
He will only get in our way as he is now.
If you value your own life, you will do it.
Um, you do not have to bother with me, really.
I would feel awful causing trouble for a girl in a wheelchair, too.
My, you are very kind, Ouma.
This wheelchair is something that makes me who I am.
I do not need your consideration.
Hey, are you serious about jumping?
Come on, just get over here!
My clothes and the pen are both gone...
Your training starts now, got it?
I said you did not have to...
I do not like this either!
I am only doing it because Gai said to.
Why did you even want to join the Undertakers, anyway?
You are a laughably bad fit for us.
Do not tell me it is yours?
Oh, wait, I have got a great idea.
We are planning to test you in a week to see if you have got what it takes to be in the Undertakers.
I will let you have this back if you pass.
I am Tsukishima Argo, a second year at Ryusen High.
Come at me like you are really trying to kill me.
The title of an Undertaker is a heavy one.
Do not let this scare you!
I am more into cultural stuff!
What do you think of him, Ogumo?
She is really good at this sort of stuff.
You are going to try to be this good, too.
The slide will skin your hand like that.
Do not get too close to me.
The Leucocyte Plan seems to be coming along nicely.
I am fond of perverse tastes like that.
How is the wedge you sent to divide them?
The chances that he will do it are fifty-fifty.
Oh, hey, I hear you are going to be with Gai on this one, huh Kyo?
I will finally have the chance to fight with him!
It is a shame I will not get to see the mock battle,
but give it all you have got, Shu!
I guess everybody follows the confident people, huh.
I mean, even if I did the same things,
I am pretty sure nobody would follow me.
I guess it is the selfish people who get ahead in this world after all.
Right now, you cannot see anything.
Though at the rate you are going, I am not sure you ever will...
But either way, do not you think that was insulting to Gai and every one of us?
Can you draw out those Void things from anybody?
With how hard I am trying, it is like I am really planning to join these guys.
I shall sing the proof that you lived
For the sake of those who have no names
This is kind of like the first time we met, huh?
Hey, Inori, why are you in the Undertakers?
There are a lot of reasons...
is that I was happy, I think.
I was happy you came for me back there!
I said, Let us leave the Undertakers together,
I had nothing, and he gave me a name.
What about that I belong to you and stay with you forever stuff, then?!
Do not get too close to me.
Was this just another one of my one-sided misunderstandings?
Why does everyone like Gai the most?!
Why do not you watch where you are going?
They spend the night together like that two or three times a month.
We pretend not to see it, but I think we have all noticed by now.
Are you okay with it, Ayase?
Well, you like Gai, do not you?
What are you basing that on?!
That is not what is going on!
I cannot help but think it is just about
girls always going for the cocky jerks with handsome faces.
I know I am probably wrong, though.
I know it is probably because I am just a kid who cannot see anything, but...
If you want to find out, start by winning tomorrow's mock battle.
If you win, you will officially be one of us.
I am sure you will start seeing the light then.
My policy is to never get help from anyone.
But I do not exactly look elegant crawling up into it myself,
so I do not like people watching me, either.
You look more like her every day.
The OAU and the Leaving Nations.
All right, time to start the mock battle.
This battle is modeled on Scenario D-14 in the operation to take the Leucocyte,
and assumes that you end up having to face an Endlave by yourself.
If you can get past Steiner
and can take shelter in the vehicle behind me, you win.
Even paint bullets can knock you unconscious if they hit you.
Even I cannot dodge Ayase's Endlave.
And she is gotten faster since she got Steiner, too.
You are showing me your back?
The way you are running away is pathetic!
It is just unreasonable to ask me to manage without a weapon!
You will be dead if you do not stop messing around!
You just used something that makes you who you are.
A light that brings darkness... am I really a gloomy guy deep down?
Starting today, you are one of us.
If it is important to you, hang on to it from now on and do not lose it.
The person you rescued from Isolation Facility Four.
What do you mean, playing teammates?
What is that Gai up to?
The Leucocyte was just fired at Point Delta!
At the place where Gai is?
I am the way to a forsaken people...
Abandon all hope, ye who enter here.
These days you love me no more
nor am I still treasured by you
What did you tell me when we parted?
The words hung in midair and never reached me
I know my dreams and wishes are illusory
and yet I cannot give up on them
You said, Do not let go, hold onto my hand
and, We will always be together
Your hands as I held them were warm
and tries to hurt you with cruel words,
even if the world does not try to believe you
and places a crown of thorns upon your head,
I can take your side, and yours alone
I know your pain and loneliness
So everything that makes me whole
I will give that to you now
